caption.p: Morphology and anatomy of L. crithmoides leaf. ( A) Morphology, ( B) A transverse section in leaf showing the general view, Ep: epidermis, Pa: palisade tissue, Sd: schizogenous duct, Vb: vascular bundle; ( C) phenolic idioblasts (Pi), Thw: thick wall, Cu: cuticle; ( D) guard cells (Gc), Sc: substomatal chamber; ( E) lysigenous duct (Ld), Sd: schizogenous duct, Cu: cuticle; ( F) Oil drops (Od); ( G) crystals (Cr) and ( H) enlarged vascular bundle (Vb), Mx: metaxylem, Px: protoxylem, Ph: phloem, Sd: schizogenous duct. Bar: B = 40 µm, C–H = 400 µm, E = 100 µm.
